Machine Code:

Stored Values:
10011: 00000000000000000000000000001000 (x19)
10010: 00000000000000000000000000000111 (x18)
01001: 00000000000000000000000000000000 (x9)


R_Type:

ADD:  	00000001001110010000010010110011
Answer:
01001: 00000000000000000000000000001111

SUB: 	01000001001110010000010010110011
Answer: 
01001: 11111111111111111111111111111111

SLL:  	00000001001110010001010010110011
Answer: 
01001: 00000000000000000000010000000000

SLT:  	00000001001110010010010010110011
Answer: 
01001: 00000000000000000000000000000000

SLTU: 	00000001001110010011010010110011
Answer: 
01001: 00000000000000000000000000000000

XOR:  	00000001001110010100010010110011
Answer: 
01001: 00000000000000000000000000001111

SRL:  	00000001001110010101010010110011
Answer: 
01001: 00000000000000000000000000000000

OR:   	00000001001110010110010010110011
Answer: 
01001: 00000000000000000000000000001111

AND:  	00000001001110010111010010110011
Answer: 
01001: 00000000000000000000000000000000

I_Type:

LW:	00100110000010011010010010000011
Answer:
01001:  10101010101010101010101010101010

ADDI:	00100110000010011000010010010011
Answer:
01001:  00000000000000000000000000001011

SLTIU:	00100110000010011011010010010011
Answer:
01001:	00000000000000000000000000000000

JALR:	00100110000010011000010011100111
Answer: After executing the JALR instruction, the address of the next instruction (PC+4) would be stored in register x9

S_Type:

SW:	00000001001010011010000000100011
Answer:	The value 8 will be stored in memory at address 7.
01001:	00000000000000000000000000001000
